MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 postcode area of Betws y Coed, affecting properties in Capel Curig and srrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations on site and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50PM 25th December 2020
